metadata.title: CVE-2023-22909 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.9, 1.36.x through 1.38.xbefore 1.38.5, and 1.39.x before 1.39.1. SpecialMobileHistory allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service because database queries are slow.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
